title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 381.6 - Uniform procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 381.6 - Uniform procedures

State Regulations

The procedures applicable to the submittal and processing
of applications for permits, permit renewals and permit modifications, and the
procedures applicable to the modification, suspension and revocation of
permits, pursuant to this Part, are set forth in ECL, article 70 and Part 621
of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
381.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
